name: Visual Basic Economy (ViBE)
desc: ViBE has been a massive project, which has several subprograms. All of which are designed for the UMS

name: .NET Economy (Neco)
desc: Neco is the next iteration of ViBE. Reworked from the ground up to use a database and other proper industry tools, all accessible through an SPA

name: BasicRender
desc: BasicRender is a set of C# class libraries that make it easy to render text and graphics on a .NET Console

name: Atlas
desc: Atlas is a simple wiki app using a markdown-like syntax currently used to power the UMS Wiki

name: Chamomile
desc: Chamomile is a much more beginner friendly AI image generation suite powered by the Automatic1111 API

name: INSO Projects
desc: As part of becoming a Software Engineer, we've designed several apps in large teams, with various technologies
